cards.flavor: Realizing what had happened, Humar knew that the madness of the world was not his own.
cards.name: A Moment in Time
cards.text:
Return target spell to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor: The proper cost for a life is home.
cards.name: A Place to Protect
cards.text:
When A Place to Protect enters, create four 1/1 white Human creature tokens.
Creatures you control get +1/+1.

cards.flavor: The past is an illusion and the present even more so.
cards.name: Abandon Stagnation
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

cards.name: Absurdity
cards.text:
Protection from noncreatures and from creatures with power 3 or less
Players dealt damage by Absurdity also get that many poison counters. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)
When Absurdity is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

cards.flavor: “I took one step towards them. I felt the joy of becoming something. A failure dead at the hands of a master. A master that proved themselves greater than history. Both outcomes were joyous.”
cards.name: Accomplished Master
cards.text: Double strike

cards.flavor: Nothing knows when to die.
cards.name: Accursed Bear
cards.text: You may exert Accursed Bear as it attacks. When you do, it gets +1/+0 and gains trample until end of turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.flavor: The first swing is foreign. The second is a long lost friend. The third encompasses all your passion.
cards.name: Act of Treason
cards.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (If you exert it, it will still untap for other players.)

cards.flavor: It is possible to overcome size or numbers, but never both.
cards.name: Aided Assault
cards.text: Move up to one +1/+1 counter from a creature you control to target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control.

cards.name: Alida, Resolute
cards.text:
[+1]: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. You gain 2 life.
[0]: Creature spells you cast this turn can't be countered. As they enter, they gain hexproof until your next turn.
[-2]: Create a green enchantment token named Survival with “You and other permanents you control have ward {1}.”

cards.name: Allure of the Woods
cards.text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}.
{1}{G}, Sacrifice Allure of the Woods: Draw a card.

cards.flavor: When trapped in the Wiedfree you must also experience its cleansing rituals.
cards.name: Amid Flames
cards.text:
Amid Flames deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
You may sacrifice a land. If you do, draw a card.

cards.flavor: “Do you see their face? Or their thoughts?”
cards.name: Anxious Worries
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Anxious Worries enters, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

cards.flavor:
“The consumption of the Wiedfree is slow, but certain.”
—Tales of the Wild, Vol. II
cards.name: Arborback Stomper
cards.text:
Trample
When Arborback Stomper enters, you gain 5 life.

cards.name: Army Guide
cards.text:
When Army Guide dies, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
{2}{G}{W}, Sacrifice Army Guide: Exile target noncreature, nonland permanent. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.name: Army Saboteur
cards.text: Whenever one or more creatures you control deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice one of them. When you do, destroy target creature defending player controls, then you and the destroyed creature's controller draw a card.

cards.flavor: Persistence is a virtue.
cards.name: Asking Imp
cards.text: When Asking Imp enters, an opponent may pay 2 life. If they do, return Asking Imp to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: “Will the heavens sing when it is over?”
cards.name: Assurance of Finality
cards.text:
When Assurance of Finality enters, you may discard a card. If you do, draw two cards.
{1}, Sacrifice Assurance of Finality: Creatures you control gain haste until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The world met cries with hateful deigns.
cards.name: Awoken Elemental
cards.text: You may exert Awoken Elemental as it attacks. When you do, Awoken Elemental fights another target creature. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.flavor: Outside of the Wiedfree, animals are uncommon. Trusting them to not be demonic is far more than down-trodden folks are able to give, breeding hostility in both directions.
cards.name: Baleful Raven
cards.text: Flying, deathtouch

cards.flavor: The sanctity of the dead has even less priority than that of the living.
cards.name: Battlefront Scavenger
cards.text:
Flying
When Battlefront Scavenger enters, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Become Oneself
cards.text:
If you control ten or more nonland permanents, you get an emblem with “At the beginning of your end step, return target permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield.”
Destroy all nonland permanents.

cards.name: Belief in the World
cards.text:
When Belief in the World enters, you may tap two untapped creatures you control. If you do or you control two or more Spirits, search your library for a Spirit card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Creatures you control get +1/+1.

cards.name: Bestower of Princely Sin
cards.text: {T}, Exert Bestower of Princely Sin: You may sacrifice another creature. If you do, target opponent may sacrifice a permanent that shares a card type with it. If they don't, that player loses 1 life and you draw a card. Repeat this process for artifact, enchantment, land, and planeswalker. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.name: Bound by Nature
cards.text:
Bound by Nature enters with X nature counters on it.
You can't cast nonpermanent spells.
Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each nature counter on Bound by Nature and have “{T}: Add {G}.”

cards.name: Boundless Hopes
cards.text:
Flying
When Boundless Hopes enters, another target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.
Fleeting {U} (You may cast this spell for its fleeting cost. If you do, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.flavor: The end is naught but a deadline.
cards.name: Brash Charger
cards.text:
Haste
You may exert Brash Charger as it attacks. When you do, creatures with power 1 or less can't block this turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.flavor: What were in the past timid heatwaves are now agonizing firestorms.
cards.name: Burning Winds
cards.text:
This spell can't be countered.
Burning Winds deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If that permanent would die this turn, exile it instead.

cards.flavor: Mortal is such a lofty way of describing feeble existences doomed even in memory.
cards.name: Call of the Void
cards.text: Each player sacrifices a creature. Then return a creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.flavor: No responsibilities now or ever.
cards.name: Carefree Performer
cards.text:
Carefree Performer can't be sacrificed.
You may exert Carefree Performer as it attacks. When you do, discard two cards, then draw two cards. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.name: Cinders of an Old Era
cards.text:
Each player discards their hand and sacrifices five lands. Cinders of an Old Era deals 5 damage to each creature and planeswalker.
At the beginning of each player's next first main phase, that player draws seven cards and adds five mana in any combination of colors.

cards.name: Climber's Outfit
Comforting Presence
cards.text:
Flash
When Comforting Presence enters, return target spell with mana value 2 or less to its owner's hand.
Whenever an opponent casts their second spell each turn, draw a card.

cards.name: Commence Hostilities
cards.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to up to one other target creature. Then if you've cast another spell this turn, the creature you control gains double strike until end of turn.

cards.name: Concoquo, Wiedfree Sage
cards.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. Then if a card exiled with Concoquo has flying, creatures you control gain flying until end of turn. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance.

cards.flavor: His story was of rugged individualism. His reality was not so idyllic.
cards.name: Confident Traveler
cards.text: When Confident Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Human creature token. If Confident Traveler was sacrificed, create two of those tokens instead.

cards.flavor: Sweetened words of heartfelt gratitude rouse the most stagnant hearts.
cards.name: Confirmor of Virtue
cards.text:
Flying
At end of combat on your turn, untap all creatures you control with power greater than their base power.

cards.name: Conscious Taboo
cards.text: When Conscious Taboo enters, look at target opponent's hand. You may exile a noncreature, nonland card from it. For as long as that card remains exiled, its owner may play it. A spell cast this way costs {2} more to cast.

cards.flavor: A choice towards glory, and a choice away from it. That's all there ever is.
cards.name: Consider
cards.text:
Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
Draw a card.

cards.flavor: “Possible is an ugly word. Impossible leaves me alone, but possible haunts me.”
cards.name: Corrupted Amalgam
cards.text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each card type among cards in your graveyard.
Deathtouch

cards.name: Curious Traveler
cards.text:
Elemental, Demon, and Spirit spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever you cast a Elemental, Demon, or Spirit spell, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)

cards.flavor:
“Oh lord, give unto me myself.
Oh teacher, let me know my role.
Oh friend, tell me who I am.
For I do not want to be alone.”
cards.name: Death of Belief
cards.text: Each creature can't have power greater than its base power and can't have toughness greater than its base toughness.

cards.name: Deathmarked Explorer
cards.text:
You may exert Deathmarked Explorer as it attacks. When you do, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is 10 minus your life total. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
{T}, Discard a card: Draw a card. Deathmarked Explorer deals 2 damage to you.

cards.flavor: A lineage now bound by legacy.
cards.name: Decrepit Hero
cards.text:
When Decrepit Hero dies, create a 2/2 black Soldier creature token.
Fleeting {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its fleeting cost. If you do, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.flavor: The loss of life creates a life of its own.
cards.name: Dedicated Retribution
cards.text:
Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
Target creature blocks this turn if able.

cards.flavor: Walk far into the Wiedfree, away from human miseries.
cards.name: Deserter's Wandering
cards.text: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature card and/or a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

cards.name: Desolate Path
cards.text:
Desolate Path enters tapped unless you control one or fewer other lands.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor: Thievery is a short life when people are so wary and harsh.
cards.name: Desperate Thief
cards.text: Whenever Desperate Thief deals combat damage to a player, you may pay 2 life. If you do, draw a card.

cards.flavor: “If I were to die, would I scream?”
cards.name: Desperate Vanguard
cards.text:
Haste
Fleeting {B} (You may cast this spell for its fleeting cost. If you do, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.flavor:
“...And for as long as you remember them, the riders of the Pale Night will live on.”
—Children's story
cards.name: Detached Specters
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Detached Specters.

cards.name: Devoted Artistry
cards.text:
Exile the top two cards of your library. Until your next end step, you may play those cards.
Whenever you cast your third spell each turn, you may exile Devoted Artistry from your graveyard. If you do, you may cast a copy of it at the beginning of your next upkeep. (You still pay its costs.)

cards.name: Dias, Freed from Belief
cards.text:
Whenever a creature you control dies, put a loyalty counter on Dias, Freed from Belief.
[0]: Create a 2/1 black Nightmare creature token with “This creature can't block.”
[-X]: Destroy target creature or planeswalker unless an opponent pays twice X life.

cards.flavor:
Day 613: Society is no longer within me
Day 733: I reject my nature
Day 941: I am a scraped tablet
Day 1: I shall begin to write
cards.name: Diminish to Obscurity
cards.text: Exile target nonland permanent.

cards.flavor: Empires rise and fall, but the Wiedfree remains. Ever vast, ever inviting, ever consuming.
cards.name: Dissolve into Nature
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Target player sacrifices an artifact.
• Target player sacrifices an enchantment.

cards.name: Distant Path
cards.text:
Distant Path enters tapped unless you control one or fewer other lands.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor: The child found one last spark of life to give the demon asking for everything.
cards.name: Distorted Fantasy
cards.text:
Choose one or both —
• Destroy target creature with mana value 1 or less.
• Each player discards a card.

cards.flavor: Giants were more than willing to take on naive challengers.
cards.name: Domineering Champion
cards.text:
Reach
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Domineering Champion this turn dies, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.

cards.name: Dormant Memory
cards.text:
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, you may have Dormant Memory phase out until you cast your second spell in a turn. (While phased out, treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist.)
Fleeting {1}{U} (You may cast this spell for its fleeting cost. If you do, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Doubt Oneself
cards.text:
Return target nonland permanent you control and target nonland permanent you don't control to their owners' hands.
{2}{U}, Exile Doubt Oneself from your graveyard: Search your library for a card named Study Oneself, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.name: Dreamscaper
cards.text:
Dreamscaper enters tapped with three stun counters on it. (If it would become untapped, remove a stun counter from it instead.)
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, you may untap Dreamscaper or tap target creature.
Whenever Dreamscaper deals combat damage to a player, draw two cards.

cards.name: Embodiment of Nature
cards.text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose one —
• Embodiment of Nature gains haste and hexproof until your next turn.
• Embodiment of Nature gains vigilance and indestructible until your next turn.
• Embodiment of Nature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until your next turn.

cards.flavor: The body wants to hide from the cruelness of the cold, but somehow, to the mind, it feels so welcoming.
cards.name: Embraced by Depths
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -3/-3.

cards.name: Emirik Invigilator
cards.text:
When Emirik Invigilator enters, exile another target nonland permanent until Emirik Invigilator leaves the battlefield.
Fleeting {1}{W} (You may cast this spell for its fleeting cost. If you do, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.flavor: Lumen cells, batteries able to store the sun's excess energy, were hidden around Emirik. But anyone paying attention to the patrols could find them.
cards.name: Emirik Patrol
cards.text:
Vigilance
When Emirik Patrol enters, create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens.

cards.name: End of History
cards.text:
Ward—Sacrifice three permanents.
At the beginning of your end step, put a desperation counter on End of History. Draw two cards for each counter on it, then exile the top three cards of your library for each counter on it.

cards.name: Enduring Force
cards.text:
Trample
{1}{G}{W}, Discard Enduring Force: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
{G}{W}: Return Enduring Force from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.name: Engrossed Reader
cards.text:
{U}: If Engrossed Reader doesn't have flying, put a flying counter on it.
{1}{U}: If Engrossed Reader has flying, draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on Engrossed Reader.
{1}{U}{U}: If Engrossed Reader has a +1/+1 counter on it, it becomes a copy of another target creature until end of turn.

cards.name: Erosive Path
cards.text:
Erosive Path enters tapped unless you control one or fewer other lands.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Ethics and Reanimation
cards.text:
{B}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. You gain 2 life.
{1}{B}, {T}: Mill three cards. You lose 2 life.
{3}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Ethics and Reanimation: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.flavor: Being able to leave made Alida uncomfortable.
cards.name: Evaluate the End
cards.text:
Put up to one target artifact, instant, or sorcery card from your graveyard on top of your library.
Investigate twice. (Create two colorless Clue artifact tokens with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)

cards.name: Expressive Performer
cards.text:
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, Expressive Performer deals 1 damage to each opponent.
{3}{R}, {T}, Exert Expressive Performer: It deals 2 damage to each player. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.name: Extoller of Effort
cards.text:
You may exert Extoller of Effort as it attacks. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
Whenever you exert a creature, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.

cards.name: Famished Verdure
cards.text:
Voracious 2 (As this enters, you may sacrifice up to two artifacts and/or creatures. This creature enters with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
Vigilance, haste
{T}: Add {G}. If a creature died under your control this turn, add {G}{G} instead.

cards.name: Faraway Albatross
cards.text:
Flying, ward {2}
Whenever Faraway Albatross attacks, choose one —
• Faraway Albatross gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each spell you've cast this turn.
• Investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)

cards.name: Faulty Lock
cards.text:
When Faulty Lock enters or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, choose a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player this turn, draw a card.
{2}{U}: Sacrifice Faulty Lock. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.name: Fervent Igmel
cards.text:
Flying
You may exert Fervent Igmel as it attacks. When you do, add {R}{R}{R}{R}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.flavor: “To reach out and touch an Igmel's plumage. To take a feather into your hands and feel it burn. To hold it to your eyes and scream: ‘This is life!'”
cards.name: Firebird's Passion
cards.text: Exile the top three cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

cards.name: Fleetfooted Survivalist
cards.text:
You may exert Fleetfooted Survivalist as it attacks. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
Whenever an exerted creature you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

cards.name: Flickers in the Night
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
Whenever another Spirit you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on Flickers in the Night.

cards.name: Fog-Lit Piracy
cards.text:
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
Fleeting {1}{U} (You may cast this spell for its fleeting cost. If you do, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.flavor: Partake in its energy and become one with the forest.
cards.name: Font of Natural Essence
cards.text: Whenever Font of Natural Essence enters or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

cards.flavor:
“Eat of the Wiedfree at dawn, then sleep on your own rations or nothing at all.”
—Tales of the Wild, Vol. II
cards.name: Font of Strength
cards.text: Whenever Font of Strength enters or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, target creature you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Nostalgic safety in a desperate world.
cards.name: Forgotten Idol
cards.text:
As Forgotten Idol enters, choose a card name.
Spells with the chosen name can't be cast.
{2}, Exile a card with the chosen name from your hand: Exile Forgotten Idol, then each player draws a card. Any player may activate this ability.

cards.name: Forgotten King's Mask
cards.text:
Whenever Forgotten King's Mask enters or equipped creature dies, attach it to target creature you control.
Equipped creature has base power and toughness 5/5 and is a Noble in addition to its other types.
{1}{R}, Discard two cards: Create a 1/1 white Human creature token and attach Forgotten King's Mask to it. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.flavor: Disqualified for the army, disqualified for the trades, disqualified for society, and disqualified as a human being.
cards.name: Forgotten Wretch
cards.text: When Forgotten Wretch enters, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, draw a card.

cards.name: Forlorn Path
cards.text:
Forlorn Path enters tapped unless you control one or fewer other lands.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Forlorned Knight
cards.text:
When Forlorned Knight enters, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens.
Whenever you attack, if another creature died under your control this turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Fleeting {W}{B} (You may cast this spell for its fleeting cost. If you do, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Formative Experience
cards.text: Exile target creature you control, then each other player may exile a creature they control. Each player who exiled a creature this way reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card with mana value different from the creature they exiled, puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles.

cards.flavor: Veterans learn to use anything for survival.
cards.name: Frontline Veteran
cards.text: When Frontline Veteran enters, you may sacrifice another creature or artifact. If you do, draw a card.

cards.name: Fungal Goliath
cards.text:
Voracious 2 (As this enters, you may sacrifice up to two artifacts and/or creatures. This creature enters with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
Trample
At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died under your control this turn, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

cards.flavor:
“When rotting begins there is no hope, as the body has already become foreign.”
—Tales of the Wild, Vol. II
cards.name: Fungal Infection
cards.text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

cards.flavor:
“I grasped the apple and it mushed. It had given way to rot, yet it persisted.”
—On Spirits and Demons
cards.name: Gangling Titan
cards.text: Gangling Titan has menace and deathtouch as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

cards.flavor:
“Be wary of hermits. They hide beneath a veneer of society, but have all been consumed by the Wiedfree.” 
—Tales of the Wild Vol. II
cards.name: Generous Hermit
cards.text: When Generous Hermit dies, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)

cards.flavor:
“Turning fantasy into reality is the realm of the truly deluded.”
—On Spirits and Demons
cards.name: Ghastly Belief
cards.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If you control a Demon, each opponent loses 3 life.

cards.name: Ghim, King's Servant
cards.text:
Creatures you control have deathtouch as long as they're attacking.
[+1]: Target creature you control must be blocked this turn if able.
[-2]: Create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens.
[-X]: Destroy target artifact or enchantment with mana value X and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent.

cards.flavor: Ghim was satisfied, knowing his king's bidding was done and the end was nigh.
cards.name: Ghim's Demise
cards.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. If a planeswalker is destroyed this way, search its owner's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

cards.name: Giant's Blade
cards.text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may exert an untapped creature you control with power 4 or greater. If you do, attach Giant's Blade to that creature. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
Equipped creature attacks each combat if able.
Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has haste.
Equip {3}

cards.flavor:
A sight for all.
A road map for some.
cards.name: Great Beyond
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Great Beyond: Draw a card.

cards.name: Halford, the Rightful King
cards.text:
Whenever Halford enters or attacks, an opponent chooses one. When they choose one that has already been chosen, copy that ability.
• That opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
• That opponent sacrifices a permanent.
• That opponent discards a card. If they can't, draw a card.

cards.name: Hallowed Perspective
cards.text:
Flying
When Hallowed Perspective enters, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)
You may exert Hallowed Perspective as it attacks. When you do, until your next turn, you may cast spells as though they had flash. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.name: Heavenly Bull
cards.text:
You may exert Heavenly Bull as it attacks. When you do, it gains indestructible until end of turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
{3}{G}{W}: Destroy all nonland permanents with mana value 3 or less. Activate only if Heavenly Bull is attacking and only once.

cards.flavor: “The weakness of my body is temporary, as my soul is strong.”
cards.name: Heretical Soulshifter
cards.text: {B}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Heretical Soulshifter: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.flavor: Live up to an exaggerated history.
cards.name: Heroic Exemplar
cards.text: Whenever Heroic Exemplar attacks, if its power is greater than its base power, other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: “As a child I read of heroes, and now I am a pale imitation of one. But to be among their ranks, however slight, is enough.”
cards.name: Heroic Inspiration
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Hinterland Ritualist
cards.text: {2}{R}, {T}, Exert Hinterland Ritualist, Sacrifice another creature: Hinterland Ritualist deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target. Activate only as a sorcery. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.name: Humar, Mad Researcher
cards.text:
You have no maximum hand size.
Whenever a player casts a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Humar.
At the beginning of your upkeep, target player draws cards equal to Humar's power.

cards.name: Hunted Wolf
cards.text:
Voracious 2 (As this enters, you may sacrifice up to two artifacts and/or creatures. This creature enters with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
When Hunted Wolf enters, create a 2/2 black Soldier creature token.

cards.name: Hunting Ground
cards.text:
When Hunting Ground enters, create four 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
Whenever a creature you control dies, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Ideoscio
cards.text:
Whenever you cast a spell, you may cast a spell from your hand with lesser mana value without paying its mana cost.
You can't cast more than one spell of each card type each turn.

cards.name: Igniderm
cards.text:
Ward—Pay 3 life.
Igniderm enters with three ignition counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, remove an ignition counter from Igniderm. If you can't, sacrifice it.

cards.name: Igniter of Unbridled Fury
cards.text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, gain control of another target permanent until end of turn. Untap that permanent. It gains haste until end of turn.
Fleeting {2}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its fleeting cost. If you do, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Impassioned Craze
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Impassioned Craze enters, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has “{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.”

cards.flavor: Are thoughts clearer under the waves? More pure? Lighter?
cards.name: Inquisitive Pod
cards.text:
When Inquisitive Pod enters, draw a card.
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, Inquisitive Pod gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Knowledge kept from future generations is indulgence, but oh how sweet it is to taste the pinnacle.
cards.name: Insatiable Student
cards.text: Whenever Insatiable Student attacks, you may sacrifice an artifact. When you do, tap target creature an opponent controls.

cards.name: Intensifying Luminescence
cards.text:
Creatures you control have haste.
Whenever you attack, put a charge counter on Intensifying Luminescence.
At the beginning of your first main phase, add {R} for each charge counter on Intensifying Luminescence.

cards.flavor: They march for honor and pride, but not safety or hope.
cards.name: Into the Wiedfree
cards.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Until end of turn, creatures you control gain vigilance and “When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.”

cards.name: Irreverent Sinscape
cards.text:
When Irreverent Sinscape enters, destroy up to one other target nonland permanent.
When Irreverent Sinscape dies, exile it. When you do, you may exile any number of cards from your graveyard that have four or more card types among them. If you do, return a permanent card from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control. You may repeat this process any number of times.

cards.flavor: “The sun was high, and now we marvel at ruins. The sun is high, and we marvel at our ruinous nature.”
cards.name: Keeper of Tradition
cards.text: Whenever one or more other creatures you control die, put a +1/+1 counter on Keeper of Tradition.

cards.name: King's General
cards.text:
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, that player loses 1 life.
At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent lost 3 or more life this turn, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
Fleeting {B} (You may cast this spell for its fleeting cost. If you do, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Lamech, Seeking Apocolypse

rulings.text: The created token will enter without any abilities. ETB triggers and ’As this enters’ effects will not occur.

cards.text:
Fleeting {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its fleeting cost. If you do, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)
[+1]: Any number of other target nonland permanents lose all abilities until your next turn.
[0]: You may tap an untapped creature you control. If you do, draw two cards.
[-2]: Create a token that's a copy of target creature, except it loses all abilities until end of turn.

cards.name: Lonely Gateway
cards.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice a creature. When you do, return another target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it. (If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.)

cards.flavor: Their small stature and presence deep in the Wiedfree led to wild speculation and mythos.
cards.name: Long-Lived Prowler
cards.text: Long-Lived Prowler gets +3/+0 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

cards.flavor:
Day 1: Setting out, conditions good
Day 29: What a beautiful world
Day 109: I no longer recognize myself
Day 401: What purpose I set out for has been forgotten; I have foregone my identity entirely
cards.name: Long Journey
cards.text: When Long Journey enters, exile target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls until Long Journey leaves the battlefield.

cards.flavor: The fourth strike slows. The fifth falters. The sixth never comes.
cards.name: Lost in Combat
cards.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Untap it.

cards.name: Lucid Dweller
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile any number of other cards from your graveyard that have three or more card types among them.
Deathtouch
You may cast Lucid Dweller from your graveyard.

cards.name: Lumen Cell
cards.text:
When Lumen Cell enters, create a 1/1 white Human creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control.
{1}{W}: Search your library for a card named Lumen Cell, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{6}{W}{W}{W}: You win the game. Activate only if you control four or more permanents named Lumen Cell.

cards.flavor: With wings so delicate that we feel our legs could travel endlessly.
cards.name: Manafly
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance
When Manafly enters, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

cards.flavor: Power lingers in emotion, turning any nonsensical expectation into reality.
cards.name: Manifest Irrationality
cards.text:
Add {R} and two mana of any one color.
When you next cast a spell this turn, Manifest Irrationality deals 3 damage to any target.

cards.name: Manifested Freedom
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you attack, create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens that are tapped and attacking. Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Fleeting {2}{W}{W} (You may cast this spell for its fleeting cost. If you do, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.flavor:
“Never be attracted to whimsy, lest you lose your footing.”
—Tales of the Wild, Vol. II
cards.name: Marsh Dweller
cards.text: Whenever you sacrifice one or more permanents, put a +1/+1 counter on Marsh Dweller.

cards.name: Meadow's Allure
cards.text:
Enchant creature you control
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, mill three cards.
When enchanted creature leaves the battlefield, create an X/X green Spirit creature token, where X is equal to the number of card types among cards in your graveyard.

cards.name: Meandering Path
cards.text:
Meandering Path enters tapped unless you control one or fewer other lands.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor:
“Emulating the survival instincts of animals in the Wiedfree has been deemed impossible.”
—Tales of the Wild, Vol. II
cards.name: Migrating Herd
cards.text: You may exert Migrating Herd as it attacks. When you do, sacrifice a land and draw a card. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.flavor: The armor's history drags as a chain and comforts as a blanket.
cards.name: Militant Arms
Mind's Contagion
cards.text:
Flying
Mind's Contagion has haste as long as there are two or more creature cards in your graveyard.
Whenever Mind's Contagion deals combat damage to a player, until your next turn, it gains “Noncreature spells opponents cast cost an additional 2 life to cast.”

cards.name: Mob of the End
cards.text:
Ward—Pay 2 life.
Whenever another creature dies, put a hysteria counter on Mob of the End.
At the beginning of your first main phase, remove all hysteria counters from Mob of the End and add that much {R}.

cards.name: Murky Path
cards.text:
Murky Path enters tapped unless you control one or fewer other lands.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor:
“... The hero, worn from life, chose the existence of elk rather than that of a king.”
—Tales of the Wild, Vol. I
cards.name: Mystical Elk
cards.text: {T}: Mystical Elk becomes a copy of target creature card in your graveyard. Activate only as a sorcery. (It loses this ability.)

cards.flavor: “Now we forget.”
cards.name: New State of Mind
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Exile target permanent you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
• Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

cards.name: Nitrous Renewer
cards.text:
When Nitrous Renewer enters, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
{3}{G}, Exile Nitrous Renewer from your graveyard: Return target land card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.name: Obsessive Ritualist
cards.text:
Other creatures you control get +2/+0.
Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1.
Fleeting {2}{B} (You may cast this spell for its fleeting cost. If you do, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Opportunistic Beast
cards.text:
Voracious 2 (As this enters, you may sacrifice up to two artifacts and/or creatures. This creature enters with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
When Opportunistic Beast enters, destroy up to one target creature that was dealt damage this turn.

cards.flavor: Any death attracts scavengers.
cards.name: Otherworldly Researcher
cards.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, up to one target artifact or non-Aura enchantment you control becomes a 3/3 creature in addition to its other types until end of turn.

cards.flavor: While undoubtedly skilled, their commitment to protection takes a more aggressive form.
cards.name: Outlands Bodyguard
cards.text:
Outlands Bodyguard can't attack alone.
You may exert Outlands Bodyguard as it attacks. When you do, it must be blocked this turn if able. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.name: Overcome Adversity
cards.text:
Kicker—Sacrifice an artifact or creature. (You may sacrifice an artifact or creature in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)
Choose target creature you control. Put a +1/+1 counter on it if this spell was kicked. Then it deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

cards.flavor: With a ‘thud' the giant fell. It was glorious! It was... gruesome. The hero has died, yet the man remains.
cards.name: Overcome Enormity
cards.text:
Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. (You need a target to cast this spell.)
Tap up to two target creatures.

cards.flavor: “Psst...”
cards.name: Overhear Paranoia
cards.text: Each player discards two cards. Then if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens.

cards.flavor: Bureaucracy wasn't popular at the best of times.
cards.name: Overwhelming Paperwork
cards.text:
When Overwhelming Paperwork enters or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return up to one target creature to its owner's hand.
{3}{U}{U}: Sacrifice Overwhelming Paperwork. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.flavor:
“Late they ride, announcing their arrival to a kingdom long past.”
—Children's story
cards.name: Pale Night Remnants
cards.text: When Pale Night Remnants enters, return up to one target nonland permanent and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent to their owners' hands.

cards.name: Perfecting Forgemaster
cards.text: Whenever Perfecting Forgemaster enters or attacks, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal an Equipment card from among them. Put it onto the battlefield if its mana value is less than or equal to the sacrificed artifact's mana value. Otherwise, put it into your hand. Then shuffle.

cards.flavor:
“Demons exist of fear and for fear.”
—On Spirits and Demons
cards.name: Pestering Imp
cards.text:
Voracious 1 (As this enters, you may sacrifice an artifact or creature. If you do, it enters with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Haste

cards.flavor: “Let my heart tell thee what it sought there, that I should be gratuitously evil, having no temptation to ill, but the ill itself. It was foul, and I loved it...”
cards.name: Petty Destruction
cards.text:
This spell can't be countered.
Destroy target nonbasic permanent.

cards.flavor: Never seen and fondly remembered.
cards.name: Picturesque Champion
cards.text:
Double strike, menace
{R}{W}, Exile Picturesque Champion from your graveyard: Target creature you control gains double strike and menace until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.name: Pious Warden
cards.text:
When Pious Warden enters, choose one —
• Exile target creature you don't control until Pious Warden leaves the battlefield.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• You gain 5 life.

cards.flavor: Foreign lands, enemies, clothes, armor, weapons, ideals. Moments before death you'll realize you can't see your humanity in any of it.
cards.name: Pitiful End
cards.text: Destroy target creature. Mill two cards.

cards.name: Poisonous Growth
Presence of the Unknown
cards.text:
When Presence of the Unknown enters, you may sacrifice a creature. When you do, exile target nonland permanent.
Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

cards.name: Promised Exaltation
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, choose one —
• Exile target creature with power less than that creature's power.
• Put two +1/+1 counters on that creature.
• That creature gains first strike and lifelink until end of turn. Untap it.

cards.name: Protector of the City
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Protector of the City enters, choose target nonland permanent. Counter all activated abilities from that source and it can't attack, block, or activate abilities until Protector of the City leaves the battlefield.

cards.name: Provoker of Mountains
cards.text:
{R}, {T}, Exert Provoker of Mountains: Create an X/X red Elemental creature token, where X is the number of spells you've cast this turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
{X}{X}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Provoker of Mountains: Provoker of Mountains deals X damage to any target.

cards.flavor: Prey are skilled, but predators are lucky.
cards.name: Rampaging Ambusher
cards.text:
Flash
Voracious 2 (As this enters, you may sacrifice up to two artifacts and/or creatures. This creature enters with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)

cards.flavor: ...Or die trying.
cards.name: Reckless Exemplar
cards.text:
Trample
When Reckless Exemplar attacks, if its power is greater than its base power, target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn.

cards.flavor:
“And I look upon the world again and again and again, hoping to find something.”
—Alida
cards.name: Recognification Process
cards.text: When Recognification Process enters and at the beginning of your upkeep, create a token that's a copy of target artifact you control, then sacrifice an artifact.

cards.name: Recognition of Mortality
cards.text:
Flash
Creatures your opponents control have base power and toughness 1/1.
Fleeting {1}{W}{W} (You may cast this spell for its fleeting cost. If you do, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.flavor: And every time you make that choice, you'll regret it until you make another.
cards.name: Reconsider
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
• Draw a card.

cards.flavor: There was always someone greater.
cards.name: Reminder of History
cards.text: Choose up to two target permanent cards in your graveyard with total mana value 4 or less. Return one to the battlefield and the rest to your hand.

cards.name: Research Aquarium
cards.text:
{2}, Sacrifice Research Aquarium: Draw a card.
When Research Aquarium is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)

cards.flavor:
“Rigor mortis may interest the curious, but the wise will know to stifle such naivety.”
—Tales of the Wild, Vol. I
cards.name: Respectful Tracker
cards.text:
{1}: Exile target card from a graveyard.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if there are three or more card types among cards exiled with Respectful Tracker, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

cards.name: Rest in the Wiedfree
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value less than or equal to the number of card types among cards in your graveyard.
• Return to the battlefield target creature card from your graveyard with mana value less than or equal to the number of card types among permanents you control.

cards.flavor:
“Man continues to explore, for conquering the old worlds has brought neither peace nor safety.”
—Tales of the Wild, Vol. III
cards.name: Restless Explorer
cards.text: When Restless Explorer enters, search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.flavor: “I don't even know how to begin...”
cards.name: Retort Nonsense
cards.text:
Counter target spell.
You may draw four cards. If you do, skip your next turn.

cards.flavor: Soldiers fought for Emirik, but walls gave civilians little comfort.
cards.name: Retreat to the Walls
cards.text:
You may cast this spell as though it had flash by sacrificing a creature in addition to its other costs.
Destroy up to four target tapped creatures.

cards.flavor: Ghim had glimpsed the nature of men and kings for merely a moment, but it filled him with strength for a lifetime.
cards.name: Return to the Natural State
cards.text: Destroy up to one target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying. Create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

cards.name: Rigid Conformist
cards.text:
When Rigid Conformist enters, for each {W} spent to cast it, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
Each creature you control gets +2/+2 if you control another creature with the same name as that creature.

cards.name: Risk Distant Lands
cards.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If you cast two or more spells this turn, it also gains haste and trample until end of turn. If you cast three or more spells this turn, it gets an additional +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: “Armies take food. But damn well I'm not giving up any of mine!”
cards.name: River Miscreants
cards.text:
When River Miscreants enters, target creature you control can't be blocked this turn.
{2}{U}: Return River Miscreants to its owner's hand. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.text:
Flash
Enchant creature

cards.text:

cards.text:
Rousing Path enters tapped unless you control one or fewer other lands.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.text:

{1}, {T}: Exile target card from a graveyard.
{5}, {T}, Sacrifice Ruins Entrance: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Ruins Guardian
cards.text:
Defender, flying
Ruins Guardian can attack as though it didn't have defender as long as a creature died under your control this turn.
Whenever Ruins Guardian attacks, you may exile two creature cards from your graveyard. If you do, draw a card.

cards.flavor: The end encourages recklessness, and recklessness causes the end. A pattern scavengers are quite happy to see.
cards.name: Ruins Pack
cards.text: Ruins Pack gets +2/+2 as long as you sacrificed a permanent this turn.

cards.flavor: Exploration feels like running away.
cards.name: Search for a New Land
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
{2}{U}{U}, Sacrifice Search for a New Land: Draw two cards.

cards.flavor: “The end of the world seems like a big enough problem for someone else to deal with. Not worth spending my hard earned time for.”
cards.name: Seeing Signs
cards.text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard a land card.

cards.flavor: To become one with the water. Shifting and morphing with any ripple. The ideal and horror of humanity.
cards.name: Shifting Dweller
cards.text:
Prowess
{1}: Shifting Dweller gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Sinful Tempter
cards.text:
Whenever you attack, each opponent loses 3 life unless they discard a card or sacrifice a nonland permanent. Repeat this process once.
Fleeting {B}{R} (You may cast this spell for its fleeting cost. If you do, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Sodden Path
cards.text:
Sodden Path enters tapped unless you control one or fewer other lands.

cards.text:
Voracious 2 (As this enters, you may sacrifice up to two artifacts and/or creatures. This creature enters with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

cards.name: Stirring Igmel
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast your first spell each turn, add {U}{U}, {U}{R}, or {R}{R}.
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)
Whenever you cast your third spell each turn, Stirring Igmel deals 3 damage to each opponent.

cards.name: Strange Sights
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Strange Sights dies, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)

cards.flavor: Structured, but not fair.
cards.name: Structured Debate
cards.text:
Players can cast spells only during their own turns.
Each player can't cast more than one spell each turn.

cards.flavor:
“Walk an old path
Tread a new path
Then you may lay claim to these halls”
—Academy Inscription
cards.name: Study Oneself
cards.text: Investigate ten times. (Create ten colorless Clue artifact tokens with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)

cards.name: Suburban Farmer
cards.text:
When Suburban Farmer enters, you may search your library for a basic Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
When Suburban Farmer dies, you gain 3 life.

cards.name: Sudden Contortions
cards.text:
Kicker—Sacrifice an artifact. (You may sacrifice an artifact in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)
Target creature's owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.

cards.name: Sunken Curiosity
cards.text:
Deathtouch
At the beginning of your end step, if you control no Sharks, create a 1/1 blue and black Demon Shark creature token with “This creature can't block” and “When this creature deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice it. If you do, draw a card.”

cards.flavor: The old-growth of the Wiedfree can only be felled by nature itself.
cards.name: Surging Lightning
cards.text: Surging Lightning deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If you've cast another spell this turn, it deals 4 damage instead.

cards.flavor: Strike the man, strike the myth, strike the horrors of this world.
cards.name: Take Grievance
cards.text: Destroy target creature, enchantment, or planeswalker. Its controller draws a card unless a creature died under your control this turn.

cards.flavor: “I turned, and knew I was not lost.”
cards.name: Terramorphic Expanse
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.flavor: Fear does not stop the brave knight with so little time to etch their name into history.
cards.name: Terrify the Unworthy
cards.text: Target player loses 3 life. Creatures you control gain menace until end of turn.

cards.name: Territorial Bear
cards.text:
Voracious 2 (As this enters, you may sacrifice up to two artifacts and/or creatures. This creature enters with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
When Territorial Bear dies, you may return up to two target artifact cards from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor: Fierce in matters of survival.
cards.name: Territorial Wolverine
cards.text: Voracious 2 (As this enters, you may sacrifice up to two artifacts and/or creatures. This creature enters with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)

cards.name: The Dreamer, Seeking
cards.text:
Whenever The Dreamer enters or you play a card exiled with them, exile the top two cards of your library face down, then another face up.
You may play face up cards exiled with The Dreamer.
{T}, Sacrifice The Dreamer: Look at each face down card exiled with The Dreamer. You may cast one without paying its mana cost.

cards.name: The Pursuit of Science
cards.text:
Whenever The Pursuit of Science enters or a nontoken creature you control dies, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)
Clues you control have “{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”

cards.text:
Thicketed Path enters tapped unless you control one or fewer other lands.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor: “Face, hands, feet, mind, heart, flames. All hot. This is life. This is worth living.”
cards.name: This-Worldliness
cards.text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws two additional cards. At the beginning of their next end step, they discard their hand.

cards.flavor: “His story leaves him alive, but gives no relief. We know of him, thus he suffers.”

cards.text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, tap Tinchor, put two +1/+1 counters on him, you draw a card, and you lose 1 life.
When Tinchor dies, put his counters on target Human you control.

cards.name: Torrid Path
cards.text:
Torrid Path enters tapped unless you control one or fewer other lands.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor: Deep into the Wiedfree, Ghim's trackers were getting closer to the world's saboteur.
cards.name: Tracking Party
cards.text:
Tracking Party enters with a +1/+1 counter on it.
{T}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Tracking Party and exert it: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.name: Transformative Paints
Transgressive Ritual
cards.text:
Kicker—Sacrifice a creature. (You may sacrifice a creature in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)
You draw two cards and you lose 2 life. If this spell was kicked, you draw four cards and you lose 4 life instead.

cards.flavor: “The air is unpleasant, the snow frigid, and our preparations meager. But for now we are fully alive.”
cards.name: Trepid Deserters
cards.text: When Trepid Deserters enters, target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
“It was built. Nature occupied it. And now you are here.”
—Concoquo, to Alida
cards.name: Tumultuous Shrine
cards.text: When Tumultuous Shrine enters or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, up to one target land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.

cards.flavor: “For the last time, these cells will not work! Bask in your glory once you have a real solution in place.”
cards.name: Turn to Argument
cards.text: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 1/1. If it's attacking, counter all triggered abilities from that source.

cards.name: Turned by Fear
cards.text:
Flash
When Turned by Fear enters, return up to one target creature to its owner's hand.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, up to one target creature gains menace until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Forever into the unknown.
cards.name: Unexplored Wilds
cards.text: Search your library for up to four basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle. You may play an additional land this turn.

cards.name: Unfathomable Terror
cards.text:
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, that player discards a card. Then that player may discard another card. If they don't, create two 2/1 black Nightmare creature tokens with “This creature can't block.”
Fleeting {1}{B}{B} (You may cast this spell for its fleeting cost. If you do, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Valorous Ideal
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Valorous Ideal enters, target creature can't block this turn.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and attacks each combat if able.
When Valorous Ideal is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Valorous Ideal to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Venerated Sanctity
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Venerated Sanctity deals combat damage to a player, put a faith counter on it. Then you may pay {X}{W} and sacrifice Venerated Sanctity. When you do, exile target nonland permanent with mana value less than or equal to X plus the number of faith counters on Venerated Sanctity.

cards.name: Vigorous Caldera
cards.text:
Whenever you attack, create an X/X red Elemental creature token that's tapped and attacking, where X is the number of attacking creatures.
Fleeting {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its fleeting cost. If you do, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.flavor: Reaching out across the waves you can sense certain death, but there's something else waiting for you.
cards.name: Vision Beyond the Waters
cards.text:
Deathtouch
When Vision Beyond the Waters enters, each player sacrifices two creatures other than this creature.

cards.flavor:
“Some claim such are souls of sailors, while others believe they guide them.”
—On Spirits and Demons
cards.name: Vivid Bloom
cards.text: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, create a 1/1 blue Jellyfish Spirit creature token with flying.

cards.name: Wall of Notes
cards.text:
Defender
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
When Wall of Notes dies, draw a card.

cards.name: Warping Relic
cards.text:
When Warping Relic enters or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, choose one —
• Draw two cards, then discard a card.
• Return another target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
• Choose any number of target creatures. Switch their power and toughness until end of turn.

cards.name: Wartorn Veteran
cards.text:
Trample, prowess
You may exert Wartorn Veteran as it attacks. When you do, double its power until end of turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.flavor:
“Oh, don't scare little rider, don't you fear.
Without your horse you'd be stranded there.”
—Children's Song
cards.name: Wary Rider
cards.text:
Wary Rider has first strike as long as its attacking.
Wary Rider gets +1/+0 as long as you control two or more other creatures.

cards.flavor:
“Check only enough to instill worry.”
—Security Guidebook
cards.name: Weary Border Guard
cards.text: {T}, Exert Weary Border Guard: Tap target creature. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.flavor:
“The Light will stand
On the brightest day
In the harshest storm
The Light will stand”
—Lighthouse Inscription
cards.name: Weathered Storm
cards.text: Whenever Weathered Storm enters or you cast your second spell each turn, Weathered Storm deals 3 damage to any target.

cards.flavor: “Close your eyes.”
cards.name: Weight of Consciousness
cards.text:
Choose any number —
• Each player loses X life.
• Each player discards X cards.
• Each player sacrifices X creatures.
• Each player sacrifices X lands.

cards.name: Whimsical Dancer
cards.text:
Flash
Whenever Whimsical Dancer enters or is exerted, target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
You may exert Whimsical Dancer as it attacks. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.flavor:
“Witness majesty. Witness monstrosity. Witness death. Witness life.”
—Tales of the Wild, Vol. II
cards.name: Wiedfree Behemoth
cards.text: You may exert Wiedfree Behemoth as it attacks. When you do, it gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.name: Wiedfree Berserker
cards.text:
You may exert Wiedfree Berserker as it attacks. When you do, target creature can't block this turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
If exerting a creature you control causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers another time.

cards.flavor: Long past expecting answers, now he hopes there's no new questions.
cards.name: Wiedfree Investigator
cards.text:
When Wiedfree Investigator enters, return up to one target artifact card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
{2}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.

cards.name: Wiedfree Roughrider
cards.text:
Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, Wiedfree Roughrider deals 2 damage to that player.
Whenever Wiedfree Roughrider attacks, you may pay {X}. When you do, destroy target noncreature, nonland permanent with mana value X.

cards.flavor: Mobility is a traveler's greatest asset.
cards.name: Wiedfree Spider
cards.text:
Voracious 1 (As this enters, you may sacrifice an artifact or creature. If you do, it enters with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Vigilance, reach

cards.name: Witness Vanity
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each card type among cards in your graveyard and has menace.
Fleeting {B} (You may cast this spell for its fleeting cost. If you do, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.flavor: Unlike their makers, compasses always know a way.
cards.name: Workshop Engineer
cards.text: Whenever an artifact you control enters or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Workshop Engineer gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Yielder of Ambition
cards.text:
Flying
When Yielder of Ambition enters, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Fleeting {W} (You may cast this spell for its fleeting cost. If you do, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Zare, Heart Transformed
cards.text:
Other creatures you control get +3/+0.
When Zare enters, create a 2/1 white Bird creature token with flying and a 3/3 green Horse creature token.
Whenever another creature you control attacks or blocks, sacrifice it at end of combat.

cards.name: Zealous Boar
cards.text:
Voracious 1 (As this enters, you may sacrifice an artifact or creature. If you do, it enters with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you sacrificed a permanent this turn, target creature you control gains trample and haste until end of turn.
